mainText:
I wanted to pass my condolences to Apple and his family and also to his
audience of millions of fans. Steve was an inspiration for me which has made
me determined to start my own business. That was 4 weeks ago. Today I've
registered my own company name and traiding and running a web design
business here in Adelaide, Australia. R.I.P Steve! You're one of the legendary
entrepreneurs!
author: Michael
